--- In gladiator@y..., johnnyoldschool@e... wrote:
> i TOTALLY put enough space in to walk around unless you are a medium 
> or large slime. you know why i ignored the space requirements of 
> medium and large slimes? because slimes are ridiculous, a, and you 
> can always grow and split down to a small slime, b.

The space requirements make the scenarios easier walk around.  I'd 
hate to be stuck continously waiting for another character to move 
before I could go any further.  What about fire elementals?
 
> the time freeze thing is MEANT to be a challenge. some teams won't 
be 
> able to defeat the mages, it appears, i suggest changing up your 
team 
> or something.

My legitimate team could defeat any scenario because the mage on the 
team has more than enough experience to freeze time, but that isn't a 
fun way to beat scenarios.

> like i said before, i playtested all my scenarios with a soldier 
> taken through the legitimate levels.

Please specify what you mean by "the legitimate levels".  Do you mean 
all the built-in scenarios, the tevfifty, and the completed part of my 
set?
